name: Small Business Administration
description: The Small Business Administration (SBA) is a United States government agency that provides support to entrepreneurs and small businesses. The mission of the Small Business Administration is to maintain and strengthen the nations economy by enabling the establishment and viability of small businesses and by assisting in the economic recovery of communities after disasters. The agencys activities are summarized as the 3 Cs of capital, contracts and counseling.
